name: San Francisco, 2118
description:
The sun is gone, and your mother is gone, but the only thing harder to find is what the hell you feel about it . You've got until next Sun-Day to find out.

This game was part of Spring Thing 2019 where it received the audience awards for Best Story and Best Sound.

If you have any issues, or just want to get in touch, you can tweet me @leahthecase or email: leahthecase@gmail.com
